page.title: 04Fishing on the River Girvan
page.content: The River Girvan is a good fishing river,with{salmon,sea trout,rainbow {trout and brown trout. The best time for fishing on the river is at night,although this limits the types of bait you can use.The best being a light colour e.g. maggots.The most productive place to fish on the River Girvan is at the end of a run because this is where the fish wait for food to come to them.The best run in Girvan is{McKissocks}a well known run to Girvan people.The River Girvan is a private river so you must buy a permit because if you don't you could be paying a Â£200 fine for poaching.
